==== Agenda ====
* 9am-Noon <nowiki>[[http://www.carrborocoworking.com/|Carrboro Creative Coworking]]</nowiki> (<nowiki>[[http://maps.google.com/maps?f=q&hl=en&geocode=&q=carrboro+creative+coworking&sll=35.911711,-79.069188&sspn=0.002459,0.005686&ie=UTF8&ll=35.91235,-79.069188&spn=0.003337,0.004222&z=18&iwloc=A|map]]</nowiki>) for <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/GlobalBugJam|Global Bug Jam]]</nowiki>
* Meet at CCC at 8am if you want to join us for breakfast at <nowiki>[[http://www.weaverstreetmarket.coop/|Weaver Street Market]]</nowiki>, which is within walking distance.
* GBJ starts at 9am with a quick introduction to <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net|Launchpad]]</nowiki>.
* We'll break some time after noon and continue the discussion over lunch, if you want.
* Preparation:
** Have an account on <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net|Launchpad]]</nowiki>
** Read up on <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/HelpingWithBugs|Helping with bugs]]</nowiki>
** Come prepared to learn, contribute, and have fun.
